pkgmetadata.longdescription: Effect Modification in Observational Studies Using the Submax Method // Effect modification occurs if a treatment effect is larger or more stable in certain subgroups defined by observed covariates. The submax or subgroup-maximum method of Lee et al. (2018) doi:10.1111/biom.12884 does an overall test and separate tests in subgroups, correcting for multiple testing using the joint distribution.
